monster.name: Rat

trait.name: Keen Smell
trait.text: The rat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +0 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1 piercing damage.

monster.description: Source: Monster Manual p. 335, Tales from the Yawning Portal, Tomb of Annihilation, Waterdeep: Dragon Heist, Ghosts of Saltmarsh, Baldur's Gate: Descent Into Avernus, Explorer's Guide to Wildemount, Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden
